name: Broken Dreams (itch) (Senem)
description:
We developed Broken Dreams by using the concept of "toy" in Seed Game Jam held between 15 - 17 May 2020.

Game Description: Accompany the little boy which collects the parts of his broken toy robot. Save him from this dark and scary world and deliver it to his toy's safe hands.

Credits: Orhan Baran Çetin, Senem Aksakal, Kıvanç Ünver
